name: Interlude: Andalusia
description:
The Drowning Machine

Interlude: Andalusia

More diorama than game, I set a goal for my week off to release just one scene for The Drowning Machine. It’s been a very long time since my last release on the project and I was concerned that if I didn’t just put something out and get myself moving I’d never be able to pick it up again, so here it is.

I’m back at work on Movement I: Reverie, but I want to release more of these interludes as a way to take breaks from the full game but still be able to express something. I like making these little self contained scenes quite a bit.

A game by Fannon Cushing

In Memory of Charlie Schulz

Music by 疑心暗鬼 from the album 死と生は同じです (death and life are the same)

Released and Provided for use by Geometric Lullaby

https://geometriclullaby.bandcamp.com/album/death-and-life-are-the-same

Interlude: Andalusia was created in ~8 hours, including recreating shaders from the original release for UE5. 

https://rabbitrungames.itch.io/thedrowningmachine
